DOC.brief_summary: Off pump coronary artery bypass graft ( OPCAB ) still require myocardial protection owe intermittent regional ischemic episode . The investigator retrospectively evaluate cardioprotective clinical outcome propofol versus isoflurane anesthesia patient undergoing OPCAB .
DOC.detailed_description: Several experimental clinical research suggest volatile anesthetic may reduce mortality cardiac surgery owe precondition induced cardioprotective effect . Off-pump coronary artery bypass graft ( OPCAB ) surgery still require cardioprotective strategy due coronary hypoperfusion anastomosis . The aim study evaluate possible cardioprotective effect clinical outcome propofol versus isoflurane anesthesia patient undergo OPCAB use propensity matching .
